title: Impl check with trait ICE

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
``` rust
use std::marker::PhantomData;

struct Foo<T: Bar>(PhantomData<T>);

trait Bar: Sized {
    fn bar(n: usize) -> Foo<Self>;
}

struct A;
struct B;
impl Bar for A {
    fn bar(n: usize) -> Foo<A> {
        unimplemented!()
    }
}

impl Bar for B {
    fn bar(n: usize) -> Foo<A> { // should be Foo<B>
        unimplemented!()
    }
}

fn main() { }
```

causes on current nightly (`rustc 1.13.0-nightly (3c5a0fa45 2016-08-22)`):

